title: The Sheriff's Runaway Bride
description: Runaway Bride Caught!When Kylie Jones catches her fiance kissing another girl moments before the wedding, she runs. Smack–dab into the new deputy sheriff, who knows her former fiance all too well. Kylie is deeply touched that Zach Clayton understands— more than she ever expected. The handsome cop is in their tiny Colorado town only to fulfill a family obligation, and then he's back to the big city. Unless Kylie can lead her love–shy lawman to the wedding they've both always dreamed of.
author: Arlene James
